modShortDescription: This 7DTD mod replaces the vanilla AK-47 model with a cleaner version that has proper, precise iron-sights. It's completely functional to vanilla standards.
modDescription:
This 7DTD mod replaces the vanilla AK-47 model with a cleaner version that has proper, precise iron-sights. It is completely functional to vanilla standards, all attachments are hand placed and work as expected, and it has fire and reload animations.

## Notes

This modlet, and his other ‘replacement’ modlets, do not actually overwrite any of the vanilla files and can be installed/uninstalled on an existing save with zero ill effects. They should also be compatible with other modlets that alter [weapon](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/) properties as long as this mod loads first (which is why the mod folder names start with AAA).

## Installation Instructions

Extract archive to mods folder.

**[Download](http://www.mediafire.com/file/c8zyu2g5i27r1ei/Vanilla_AK47_Replacer_1-0.zip/file)**  
**[Download](http://www.mediafire.com/file/indh4pzd7v6eru9/Vanilla_AK47_Replacer_1-0_-_PIP_Optics_Patch.zip/file)** Compatibility Patch for His [PIP Optics Replacer](https://7daystodiemods.com/picture-in-picture-vanilla-optics-replacer/)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17714-vanilla-ak-47-replacer-fully-animated-proper-ironsights-and-attachments-etc/).

**Credits:** [Sykriss](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/sykriss/)

modDownloadURLs.Info: Compatibility Patch for His PIP Optics Replacer
